column1: Little Goat Diner////I had a Michelada to start
column2: which tasted like a good simple Bloody Mary without the toothpicks of food in it. The server Minty was personable and knew the very large menu cold. She was able to help my niece decide on a brunchy dish leaning vegetarian
column3: and chose the Goat'O Goat'O shrimp and veggie with peanut dressing salad. My wife chose the same. I chose the Sloppy Goat
column4: a Joe with BBQ goat meat and a huge pile of slaw on a ethereal bun to die for.
